sources.title: Love Again | FULL MOVIE | 2014 | Drama, Romance, Family, Inspiration, Faith | Kevin Sorbo
sources.description:
Having a distant father (Kevin Sorbo) and losing his girlfriend to his best friend (Ben Davies) leads Nathan (Jason Burkey) on a journey of rediscovery. Sometimes finding love and happiness is as simple as opening up your heart.

Directed by Spencer Fritz
Starring Kevin Sorbo, Shelley Long, Ben Davies, Kelsey Sanders, Jason Burkey, Rachel Brooke Smith
2014

Visit our new channel, Chicken Soup For the Soul TV, for more full movie uploads every week: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCofXdbFoiyYOHu-rVFmtjvQ

metadata.Plot: A young woman tries to ease the pain of her fiancé's death by sending texts to his old cell phone number, and forms a connection with the man the number has been reassigned to.
metadata.Writer: Jim Strouse, Sofie Cramer, Andrea Willson
metadata.Actors: Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Sam Heughan, Céline Dion
